blocks.name: ifpdfbi
blocks.content: Define biimplication as conditional logic operator. (Contributed by RP, 20-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifpdfbi(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wb(w0, w1), wif(w0, w1, wn(w1)))
} = {
  bitri(wb(w0, w1), wif(w0, w1, wn(w1)), wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)))
  dfbi2(w0, w1)
  bitri(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wif(w0, w1, wn(w1)), wa(wif(w0, w1, wtru), wif(w0, wtru, wn(w1))))
  anbi12i(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0), wif(w0, w1, wtru), wif(w0, wtru, wn(w1)))
  bitr4i(wi(w0, w1), wif(w0, w1, wtru), wif(wn(w0), wtru, w1))
  ifpim1(w0, w1)
  ifpn(w0, w1, wtru)
  ifpim2(w1, w0)
  bitri(wa(wif(w0, w1, wtru), wif(w0, wtru, wn(w1))), wif(w0, w1, wn(w1)), wif(w0, wa(w1, wtru), wa(wtru, wn(w1))))
  ifpan23(w0, w1, wtru, wtru, wn(w1))
  mp2an(wb(wif(w0, wa(w1, wtru), wa(wtru, wn(w1))), wif(w0, w1, wn(w1))), wb(wa(w1, wtru), w1), wb(wa(wtru, wn(w1)), wn(w1)))
  bitri(wa(w1, wtru), w1, wa(wtru, w1))
  ancom(w1, wtru)
  truan(w1)
  truan(wn(w1))
  ifpbi23(wa(w1, wtru), w1, wa(wtru, wn(w1)), wn(w1), w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ifpdfbi(wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ↔ w1)↔ if(w0, w1, ¬ w1))
} = {
  bitri((w0 ↔ w1), if(w0, w1, ¬ w1), ((w0 → w1)∧(w1 → w0)))
  dfbi2(w0, w1)
  bitri(((w0 → w1)∧(w1 → w0)), if(w0, w1, ¬ w1), (if(w0, w1, T)∧ if(w0, T, ¬ w1)))
  anbi12i((w0 → w1), (w1 → w0), if(w0, w1, T), if(w0, T, ¬ w1))
  bitr4i((w0 → w1), if(w0, w1, T), if(¬ w0, T, w1))
  ifpim1(w0, w1)
  ifpn(w0, w1, wtru)
  ifpim2(w1, w0)
  bitri((if(w0, w1, T)∧ if(w0, T, ¬ w1)), if(w0, w1, ¬ w1), if(w0,(w1 ∧ T),(T ∧ ¬ w1)))
  ifpan23(w0, w1, wtru, wtru, ¬ w1)
  mp2an((if(w0,(w1 ∧ T),(T ∧ ¬ w1))↔ if(w0, w1, ¬ w1)), ((w1 ∧ T)↔ w1), ((T ∧ ¬ w1)↔ ¬ w1))
  bitri((w1 ∧ T), w1, (T ∧ w1))
  ancom(w1, wtru)
  truan(w1)
  truan(¬ w1)
  ifpbi23((w1 ∧ T), w1, (T ∧ ¬ w1), ¬ w1, w0)
}

blocks.name: ifpdfxor
blocks.content: Define xor as conditional logic operator. (Contributed by RP, 20-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifpdfxor(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wif(w0, wn(w1), w1))
} = {
  3bitri(wxo(w0, w1), wif(w0, wn(w1), w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))), wa(wif(w0, wtru, w1), wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(wfal))))
  xor2(w0, w1)
  anbi12i(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1)), wif(w0, wtru, w1), wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(wfal)))
  ifpdfor(w0, w1)
  xchnxbir(wa(w0, w1), wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(wfal)), wif(w0, w1, wfal))
  ifpnot23(w0, w1, wfal)
  ifpdfan(w0, w1)
  bitri(wa(wif(w0, wtru, w1), wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(wfal))), wif(w0, wn(w1), w1), wif(w0, wa(wtru, wn(w1)), wa(w1, wn(wfal))))
  ifpan23(w0, wtru, w1, wn(w1), wn(wfal))
  mp2an(wb(wif(w0, wa(wtru, wn(w1)), wa(w1, wn(wfal))), wif(w0, wn(w1), w1)), wb(wa(wtru, wn(w1)), wn(w1)), wb(wa(w1, wn(wfal)), w1))
  truan(wn(w1))
  bicomi(wa(w1, wn(wfal)), w1)
  biantru(w1, wn(wfal))
  fal()
  ifpbi23(wa(wtru, wn(w1)), wn(w1), wa(w1, wn(wfal)), w1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ifpdfxor(wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ⊻ w1)↔ if(w0, ¬ w1, w1))
} = {
  3bitri((w0 ⊻ w1), if(w0, ¬ w1, w1), ((w0 ∨ w1)∧ ¬(w0 ∧ w1)), (if(w0, T, w1)∧ if(w0, ¬ w1, ¬ F)))
  xor2(w0, w1)
  anbi12i((w0 ∨ w1), ¬(w0 ∧ w1), if(w0, T, w1), if(w0, ¬ w1, ¬ F))
  ifpdfor(w0, w1)
  xchnxbir((w0 ∧ w1), if(w0, ¬ w1, ¬ F), if(w0, w1, F))
  ifpnot23(w0, w1, wfal)
  ifpdfan(w0, w1)
  bitri((if(w0, T, w1)∧ if(w0, ¬ w1, ¬ F)), if(w0, ¬ w1, w1), if(w0,(T ∧ ¬ w1),(w1 ∧ ¬ F)))
  ifpan23(w0, wtru, w1, ¬ w1, ¬ F)
  mp2an((if(w0,(T ∧ ¬ w1),(w1 ∧ ¬ F))↔ if(w0, ¬ w1, w1)), ((T ∧ ¬ w1)↔ ¬ w1), ((w1 ∧ ¬ F)↔ w1))
  truan(¬ w1)
  bicomi((w1 ∧ ¬ F), w1)
  biantru(w1, ¬ F)
  fal()
  ifpbi23((T ∧ ¬ w1), ¬ w1, (w1 ∧ ¬ F), w1, w0)
}

thm ifpbi13(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3)), wb(wif(w0, w4, w2), wif(w1, w4, w3)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3)), wif(w0, w4, w2), wif(w1, w4, w3), wa(wi(w0, w4), wi(wn(w0), w2)), wa(wi(w1, w4), wi(wn(w1), w3)))
  anbi12d(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3)), wi(w0, w4), wi(wn(w0), w2), wi(w1, w4), wi(wn(w1), w3))
  imbi1d(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3)), w0, w4, w1)
  simpl(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3))
  imp(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(wi(wn(w0), w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))
  sylbi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wi(wn(w0), w2), wi(wn(w1), w3))), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
  notbi(w0, w1)
  imbi12(wn(w0), wn(w1), w2, w3)
  dfifp2(w0, w4, w2)
  dfifp2(w1, w4, w3)
}

blocks.name: ifpbi123
blocks.content: Equivalence theorem for conditional logical operators. (Contributed by RP, 15-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifpbi123(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5)), wb(wif(w0, w2, w4), wif(w1, w3, w5)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w3a(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5)), wif(w0, w2, w4), wif(w1, w3, w5), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(wn(w0), w4)), wa(wi(w1, w3), wi(wn(w1), w5)))
  anbi12d(w3a(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5)), wi(w0, w2), wi(wn(w0), w4), wi(w1, w3), wi(wn(w1), w5))
  imbi12d(w3a(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5)), w0, w2, w1, w3)
  simp2(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5))
  imbi12d(w3a(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5)), wn(w0), w4, wn(w1), w5)
  notbid(w3a(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5)), w0, w1)
  simp1(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5))
  simp3(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3), wb(w4, w5))
  dfifp2(w0, w2, w4)
  dfifp2(w1, w3, w5)
}

blocks.name: ifpidg
blocks.content: Restate wff as conditional logic operator. (Contributed by RP, 20-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifpidg(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wb(wb(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3)), wa(wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(wa(w1, w0), w2)), wa(wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3)))))
} = {
  3bitri(wb(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3)), wa(wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(wa(w1, w0), w2)), wa(wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3)))), wb(w0, wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3))), wa(wa(wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3))), wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)))))
  bibi2i(w0, wif(w1, w2, w3), wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3)))
  dfifp4(w1, w2, w3)
  bitri(wb(w0, wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3))), wa(wa(wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3))), wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)))), wa(wi(w0, wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3))), wi(wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3)), w0)))
  dfbi2(w0, wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3)))
  anbi12i(wi(w0, wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3))), wi(wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3)), w0), wa(wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3))), wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0))))
  3bitri(wi(w0, wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3))), wa(wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3))), wo(wn(w0), wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3))), wa(wo(wn(w0), wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), wo(w1, w3))))
  imor(w0, wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3)))
  ordi(wn(w0), wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3))
  anbi12i(wo(wn(w0), wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), wo(w1, w3)), wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3)))
  3bitrri(wo(wn(w0), wo(wn(w1), w2)), wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(wa(w0, w1), w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))
  ancomst(w1, w0, w2)
  impexp(w0, w1, w2)
  bitri(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wo(wn(w0), wo(wn(w1), w2)), wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), w2)))
  imbi2i(w0, wi(w1, w2), wo(wn(w1), w2))
  imor(w0, wo(wn(w1), w2))
  bicomi(wo(wn(w0), wo(w1, w3)), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3)))
  imor(w0, wo(w1, w3))
  3bitri(wi(wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3)), w0), wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0))), wi(wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(wn(w1), w3)), w0), wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(wa(wn(w1), w3), w0)))
  imbi1i(wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3)), w0, wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(wn(w1), w3)))
  bitri(wa(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3)), wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(wn(w1), w3)), wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)))
  anbi12i(wo(wn(w1), w2), wo(w1, w3), wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3))
  bicomi(wo(wn(w1), w2), wi(w1, w2))
  imor(w1, w2)
  df-or(w1, w3)
  bicomi(wa(wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(w1), w3)), wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(wn(w1), w3)))
  cases2(w1, w2, w3)
  jaob(wa(w1, w2), wa(wn(w1), w3), w0)
  anbi2i(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(wa(wn(w1), w3), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)))
  bitri(wi(wa(wn(w1), w3), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)), wi(wa(w3, wn(w1)), w0))
  ancomst(wn(w1), w3, w0)
  pm5.6(w3, w1, w0)
  bitri(wa(wa(wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3))), wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)))), wa(wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(wa(w1, w0), w2)), wa(wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3)))), wa(wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0))), wa(wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3)))))
  ancom(wa(wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3))), wa(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0))))
  an4(wi(wa(w1, w2), w0), wi(w3, wo(w1, w0)), wi(wa(w1, w0), w2), wi(w0, wo(w1, w3)))
}

thm ifpid1g(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wb(w0, wif(w0, w1, w2)), wa(wi(w2, w0), wi(w0, w1)))
} = {
  3bitri(wb(w0, wif(w0, w1, w2)), wa(wi(w2, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wa(wa(wi(wa(w0, w1), w0), wi(wa(w0, w0), w1)), wa(wi(w2, wo(w0, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w0, w2)))), wa(wa(wi(w2, wo(w0, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w0, w2))), wa(wi(wa(w0, w1), w0), wi(wa(w0, w0), w1))))
  ifpidg(w0, w0, w1, w2)
  ancom(wa(wi(wa(w0, w1), w0), wi(wa(w0, w0), w1)), wa(wi(w2, wo(w0, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w0, w2))))
  anbi12i(wa(wi(w2, wo(w0, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w0, w2))), wa(wi(wa(w0, w1), w0), wi(wa(w0, w0), w1)), wi(w2, w0), wi(w0, w1))
  bitr2i(wa(wi(w2, wo(w0, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w0, w2))), wi(w2, w0), wi(w2, wo(w0, w0)))
  imbi2i(w2, w0, wo(w0, w0))
  pm4.25(w0)
  biantru(wi(w2, wo(w0, w0)), wi(w0, wo(w0, w2)))
  orc(w0, w2)
  bitr2i(wa(wi(wa(w0, w1), w0), wi(wa(w0, w0), w1)), wi(w0, w1), wi(wa(w0, w0), w1))
  imbi1i(w0, w1, wa(w0, w0))
  pm4.24(w0)
  biantrur(wi(wa(w0, w0), w1), wi(wa(w0, w1), w0))
  simpl(w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: ifpim23g
blocks.content: Restate implication as conditional logic operator. (Contributed by RP, 25-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifpim23g(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wb(wi(w0, w1), wif(w2, w1, wn(w0))), wa(wi(wa(w0, w1), w2), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1))))
} = {
  3bitr2i(wb(wi(w0, w1), wif(w2, w1, wn(w0))), wa(wi(wa(w0, w1), w2), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1))), wa(wa(wi(wa(w2, w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wa(w2, wi(w0, w1)), w1)), wa(wi(wn(w0), wo(w2, wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wo(w2, wn(w0))))), wa(wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)), wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)))
  ifpidg(wi(w0, w1), w2, w1, wn(w0))
  anbi12i(wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)), wi(wa(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(wa(w2, w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wa(w2, wi(w0, w1)), w1)), wa(wi(wn(w0), wo(w2, wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wo(w2, wn(w0)))))
  3bitr2i(wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)), wa(wi(wa(w2, w1), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wa(w2, wi(w0, w1)), w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)), wi(wa(w2, wi(w0, w1)), w1))
  imbi2i(w2, wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))
  dfor2(w0, w1)
  impexp(w2, wi(w0, w1), w1)
  biantrur(wi(wa(w2, wi(w0, w1)), w1), wi(wa(w2, w1), wi(w0, w1)))
  adantl(w2, w1, wi(w0, w1))
